SFC Robert B. Munsey wrote:

> I was able to pick up a book fairly cheap, but I 'seem' to remember 
> that this book was discussed in the group, however I cannot remember 
> what was written about it, nor can I find post that discuss it.
> 
> The name of the book is 
> "Secrets of the Samurai, The martial Arts of Feudal Japan" 
> by Oscar Ratti and Adele Westbrook.

Summary evaluation: don't trust the pictures, and double-check the 
contents of the text in other sources before accepting them as facts.

I think it works better as a source of inspiration for fantasy games or 
fiction with a pseudo-samurai flavour than as an actual history book.

-- 
Phil
